title: account hacked
body: i dont have acces to my email and i dont know what do to i create a smurf and i see my real account name. The hacker dont play on my account and i dont know what to do. He change my password. my real account name is dadou121

replies.body: No worries fam, hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you get the chance. After answering those verification question they can help you get back into your account.
